Name: Champion Hotpot
Desc: Increases all teammates' Crit. Rate by 30%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonator in Co-op Mode.
Bg: A steaming hot pot filled to the brim with Victor Savor, known for its spicy and flavorful taste. Chixia claims it is the best hot pot in the world. However, for those who can't handle the spiciness... caution is advised before trying.
